page.title: 01SUMMARY
page.content: This survey block has a small rural population covering the villages of Lt Blakenham,Flowton,Somersham and the out skirts of Bramford.In the 1981 census, Flowton 115,Somersham 658,Lt Blakenham 304.These are the only 3 settlements in the block.Bramford Village being in the next block away and which provides most services for this block. There is only one food shop and post office and school in this block though each village does have it's own church. Somersham,Bramford,Flowton are all mentioned in the original Domesday book and possibly Lt. Blakenham as Blakenham.The land lies along the Gipping Valley and mainly consits of arable farm land growing wheat and barley etc.Though some farms have a few head of animals.Most people have to work away from the area.Unemployment is not a problem in this area.
